title: rare Polo Grounds & Yankee Stadium postcard
author: Bicem

posts.post_title: rare Polo Grounds & Yankee Stadium postcard
posts.post_content:
Both iconic parks in one great aerial shot.  Only other one I could find sold in Huggins in 2015 for $850 (also with same back stamp - [URL="http://nov15.hugginsandscott.com/cgi-bin/showitem.pl?itemid=89067&catid=431&lotno=11"]LINK[/URL]).  SOLD

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/other/websize/polo%20yankees.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/other/websize/polo%20back.jpg[/IMG]

Also will include for free the 1939 inaugural Hall of Fame class postcard with Ruth as well as a few other early stadium postcards.

[IMG]https://www.cardcow.com/images/set671/card00094_fr.jpg[/IMG]
(stolen scan but the one you'll receive is very similar condition)

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/other/icons/ruth.jpg[/IMG]
Jeff - Great card, very nice condition, tough one to find.  Good luck with the sale.  Jim

A fellow board member has informed me that he found a 3rd one on eBay earlier this year.

Will consider any and all offers as well.
